title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When trying to export multiple files with the same name but located in different directories to a zip file, an error message is displayed. The error message states that there were problems encountered during the export process, and specifically mentions the file with the same name in project2 as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be created successfully without any error messages.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch WSWB and create two projects. 2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name, for example, 'foo.txt'. 3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and choose 'Zip File' as the export option. 4. Begin the export process and observe if any error messages are displayed.
